message: I'm being generous in the first round, but I'm sure you understand the value of time and money. Accept this and we'll both be happy.
I'm willing to split the money more evenly, but I'm also aware of the inflation. Let's be fair to both of us.
I'm willing to split the money evenly now, Bob. It's the fairest solution considering the inflation we're both facing. Let's end this before things get worse for both of us.
